preEditText:
I just wanted to configure pjsip and i wanted to learn what is the pjsip linker for qtcreator. But i had some errors. First i got the pjsip from official site. After 

./configure --prefix=/usr --enable-shared --disable-sound --disable-resample --disable-video --disable-opencore-amr CFLAGS='-O2 -DNDEBUG'

make dep && make



make install

So far everything is OK.
But when i try 

(pkg-config --libs pjsip) command i got this output : 

root@ubuntu:/home/UTS/pjproject-2.11.1# pkg-config --libs pjsip
Package pjsip was not found in the pkg-config search path.
Perhaps you should add the directory containing `pjsip.pc'
to the PKG_CONFIG_PATH environment variable
No package 'pjsip' found
postEditText:
I just wanted to configure pjsip and i wanted to learn what is the pjsip linker for qtcreator. But i had some errors. First i got the pjsip from official site. After 

./configure --prefix=/usr --enable-shared --disable-sound --disable-resample --disable-video --disable-opencore-amr CFLAGS='-O2 -DNDEBUG'

make dep && make



make install

So far everything is OK.
But when i try 

(pkg-config --libs pjsip) command i got this output : 

root@ubuntu:/home/UTS/pjproject-2.11.1# pkg-config --libs pjsip
Package pjsip was not found in the pkg-config search path.
Perhaps you should add the directory containing `pjsip.pc'
to the PKG_CONFIG_PATH environment variable
